desc.en: The 12th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Story" page and its subpages, as well as at the end of every story (To Be Continued).

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十二首曲子，尤其用于“故事”页及其下属页面中，以及每个故事的结尾（即“To Be Continued”未完待续界面）。
desc.zh_tw: The 12th track in Blue Archive, used especially in the "Story" page and its subpages, as well as at the end of every story (To Be Continued).

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.thai:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.ko:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。
desc.zh_tw:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.en: The 45th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for Abydos High School. It is often used with members from Abydos High School with situation improving. A notable usage is the strategy planning for rescuing Hoshino.
desc.jp: The 45th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for Abydos High School. It is often used with members from Abydos High School with situation improving. A notable usage is the strategy planning for rescuing Hoshino.
desc.thai: The 45th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for Abydos High School. It is often used with members from Abydos High School with situation improving. A notable usage is the strategy planning for rescuing Hoshino.
desc.ko: The 45th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for Abydos High School. It is often used with members from Abydos High School with situation improving. A notable usage is the strategy planning for rescuing Hoshino.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第三十二首曲子，阿拜多斯高中的主题曲。常用于阿拜多斯高中成员出现且情况转好时。一个比较著名的使用例是大家在计划救出星野的时候。
desc.zh_tw: The 45th track in Blue Archive, a theme song for Abydos High School. It is often used with members from Abydos High School with situation improving. A notable usage is the strategy planning for rescuing Hoshino.
